summary: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen, and ultimately the fall of Versailles.
cast: Kirsten Dunst|Jason Schwartzman|Judy Davis|Rip Torn|Rose Byrne|Asia Argento|Molly Shannon|Shirley Henderson|Danny Huston|Marianne Faithfull|Mary Nighy|Sebastian Armesto|Jamie Dornan|Aurore Clément|Guillaume Gallienne|James Lance|Al Weaver|Tom Hardy|Steve Coogan|Clara Brajtman|Mélodie Berenfeld|Jean-Christophe Bouvet|Io Bottoms|Céline Sallette|André Oumansky|Natasha Fraser-Cavassoni|Jean-Paul Scarpitta|Lucien Rolland|Clémentine Poidatz|Camille Micelli|Paul Fortune|Alexia Landeau|Joe Sheridan|Katrine Boorman|Sarah Adler|Jean-Marc Stehlé|Paul Jasmin|Francis Leplay|Mathieu Amalric|Carlo Brandt|Raphaël Neal|John Arnold|Scali Delpeyrat|Chloé Van Barthold|Phoenix|Lauriane Mascaro|Gaëlle Bona|William Doherty|Florrie Betts|Dominic Gould|Jago Betts|Axel Küng|Driss Hugo-Kalff|Fabrice Scott|Alain Doutey|Bo Barrett|Joseph Malerba|Laurent Cotillard|Susan Graham|Xavier Bonastre|Hamish Bowles|Madison Clapp|Daniel Delfosse|Sabine Glaser|Manon Grosset|Charles Hurez|Philippe Héliès|Laurent Koffel|Johann Lorillon|Isabelle Montoya|François Noah|Jeanne Raimbault|Paddy Sherlock|David Walliams
title: María Antonieta
